actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Bingaman without amendment. With written report No. 110-112.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 253.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study of water resources in the State of New Mexico.
short_title: New Mexico Aquifer Assessment Act of 2007

summary.text: New Mexico Aquifer Assessment Act of 2007 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the Director of the United States Geological Survey (USGS), to study and report to specified congressional committees on water resources in New Mexico, to include: (1) a survey of groundwater resources and a characterization of surface and bedrock geology; and (2) the Estancia Basin, Salt Basin, Tularosa Basin, Hueco Basin, and middle Rio Grande Basin. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: New Mexico Aquifer Assessment Act of 2007
New Mexico Aquifer Assessment Act of 2007
A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study of water resources in the State of New Mexico.
